text: Michaël Ngoy (born January 10, 1982) is a Swiss professional ice hockey defenceman currently played for HC Ambrì-Piotta of the National League (NL). Ngoy previously played for Lausanne HC and HC Fribourg-Gottéron before signing for HC Ambrì-Piotta for the 2016-17 season. He signed an extension with the team on June 22, 2018Michael Ngoy stays with HC Ambrì-Piotta for another year and signed a further extension with the team on April 24, 2019.Arrivals, activated options and renewals at HCAP (in Italian) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:HC Ambrì-Piotta players Category:HC Fribourg-Gottéron players Category:Lausanne HC players Category:Neuchâtel Young Sprinters HC players Category:Sportspeople from Lausanne Category:Swiss ice hockey defencemen
title: Michaël Ngoy
